    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109113</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Measurement of acceleration due to gravity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen der Beschleunigung wegen der Schwerkraft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de l'accélération due à la pesanteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medida do acceleration  devido à gravidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misura di accelerazione dovuto gravità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση της ταχύτητας λόγω στη βαρύτητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medida de la aceleración  debido a la gravedad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations showing experimental set-ups for measuring the acceleration due to gravity. This set-up uses a light gate to monitor the movement of apiece of card.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">card</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light gate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, die experimentelle 
Installationen für das Messen der Beschleunigung wegen der 
Schwerkraft zeigen. Diese Installation benutzt ein helles 
Gatter, um die Bewegung von pro stück der Karte zu überwachen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers de trois illustrations montrant des 
installations expérimentales pour mesurer l'accélération due à la 
pesanteur. Cette installation utilise une porte légère pour 
surveiller le mouvement de la pièce de la carte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de três ilustrações que mostram 
instalações experimentais para medir o acceleration  devido à 
gravidade. Esta instalação usa uma porta clara monitorar o 
movimento de cada do cartão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano le 
messe a punto sperimentali per la misurazione dell'accelerazione 
dovuto gravità. Questa messa a punto utilizza un cancello 
chiaro per controllare il movimento di per uno della scheda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν πειραματικές 
οργανώσεις για τη μέτρηση της ταχύτητας λόγω στη βαρύτητα. 
Αυτή η οργάνωση χρησιμοποιεί μια ελαφριά πύλη για να 
ελέγξει τη μετακίνηση ανά τεμάχιο της κάρτας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de tres ilustraciones que muestran las 
disposiciones experimentales para medir la aceleración  debido a la 
gravedad. Esta disposición utiliza una puerta ligera para 
vigilar el movimiento de cada uno de la tarjeta.</string>
          </description>
